name: nexusfork
description: Easily setup a cluster based http server using express and vhost. Includes patches for specific hosts like OpenShift.

scripts.test-coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --timeout 20000 --require test/support/env --bail --reporter spec --globals __typeinclude__ --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 20000 --require test/support/env --reporter spec --globals __typeinclude__ --check-leaks test/

readme:

node-nexusfork
--------------
Easily setup a cluster based http server using express and vhost.
Includes patches for specific hosts like OpenShift.

```
npm install -g nexusfork
```
